metadata.description: Input the name of your OMS Workspace

templates.name: Average CPU Usage by Application Instance
templates.query: Type=CF_ContainerMetric_CL | measure avg(CPUPercentage_d) by Environment_s,ApplicationName_s,InstanceIndex_d interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Average Memory Usage by Application Instance
templates.query: Type=CF_ContainerMetric_CL | measure avg(MemoryBytes_d) by Environment_s,ApplicationName_s,InstanceIndex_d interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Average Memory Quota Application Instance
templates.query: Type=CF_ContainerMetric_CL | measure avg(MemoryBytesQuota_d) by Environment_s,ApplicationName_s,InstanceIndex_d interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Average Disk Usage by Application Instance
templates.query: Type=CF_ContainerMetric_CL | measure avg(DiskBytes_d) by Environment_s,ApplicationName_s,InstanceIndex_d interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Average Disk Quota Application Instance
templates.query: Type=CF_ContainerMetric_CL | measure avg(DiskBytesQuota_d) by Environment_s,ApplicationName_s,InstanceIndex_d interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Total BBS Request Count
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s=RequestCount | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s

templates.name: BBS Request Latency
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s=RequestLatency | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Total Convergence LRP & Task Runs
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s=ConvergenceLRPRuns or Name_s=ConvergenceTaskRuns | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Total Convergence Tasks Kicked & Pruned
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s=ConvergenceTasksKicked or Name_s=ConvergenceTasksPruned | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Convergence LRP & Task Duration
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s=ConvergenceLRPDuration or Name_s=ConvergenceTaskDuration | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Malformed LRPs
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s:contains("ConvergenceLRPPreProcessing") | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Number of HTTP Responses
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=cc Name_s:contains("http_status") | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s,IP_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Job Queue Length
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=cc Name_s:contains("job_queue_length") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Failed Job Count
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=cc Name_s:contains("failed_job_count") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Number of Requests Completed
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=cc Name_s="requests.completed"  | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s

templates.name: Number of Requests Being Processed
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=cc Name_s="requests.outstanding" | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Number of Log Messages
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=cc Name_s:contains("log_count") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,IP_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Total & Remaining Containers
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=rep Name_s:contains("Containers") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,IP_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Total & Remaining Memory
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=rep Name_s:contains("Memory") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,IP_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Total & Remaining Disk
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=rep Name_s:contains("Disk") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,IP_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Number of CPUs
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Name_s=numCPUS | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Number of Go Routines
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Name_s=numGoRoutines | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Memory Usage
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Name_s="memoryStats.numBytesAllocated" | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Stack Allocator Memory Usage
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Name_s="memoryStats.numBytesAllocatedStack" | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Main Heap Memory Usage
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Name_s="memoryStats.numBytesAllocatedHeap" | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Garbage Collector Pause Duration
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Name_s="memoryStats.lastGCPauseTimeNS" | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Number of Memory Allocations
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Name_s="memoryStats.numMallocs" | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Number of Memory Deallocations
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Name_s="memoryStats.numFrees" | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Total Auctions
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=auctioneer Name_s:contains("Auctions") | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Name_s

templates.name: Auctions per Minute
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=auctioneer Name_s:contains("Auctions") | measure sum(Delta_d) by Environment_s,Name_s interval 1Minute

templates.name: Fetch States Duration
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=auctioneer Name_s=AuctioneerFetchStatesDuration | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: CF Apps Synchronized
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s="Domain.cf-apps" | measure min(Value_d) by Environment_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: CF Tasks Synchronized
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s="Domain.cf-tasks" | measure min(Value_d) by Environment_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Unhealthy Cells
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=rep Name_s=UnhealthyCell | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Number of Sinks
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=DopplerServer Name_s:contains("messageRouter.numberOf") | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Number of Messages Unmarshalled
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=DopplerServer Name_s:contains("dropsondeUnmarshaller") and Name_s!="dropsondeUnmarshaller.unmarshalErrors" | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Name_s

templates.name: Number of Messages Received by Listeners
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=DopplerServer Name_s="listeners.totalReceivedMessageCount" | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s

templates.name: Unmarshal Errors
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=DopplerServer Name_s="dropsondeUnmarshaller.unmarshalErrors" | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s

templates.name: Dropped Messages
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=DopplerServer Name_s="TruncatingBuffer.totalDroppedMessages" or Name_s="doppler.shedEnvelopes" | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Name_s

templates.name: Leader
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s=IsLeader | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Followers
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s=Followers | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Watchers
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s=Watchers | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Raft Term
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s=RaftTerm | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Raft Index
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s=RaftIndex | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Sending & Receiving Bandwidth Rate
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s:contains("BandwidthRate") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Sending & Receiving Request Rate
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s:contains("RequestRate") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Latency
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s=Latency | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Sent & Received Append Requests Rate
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s:contains("AppendRequests") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Sets Success & Fail
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s:contains("Sets") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Gets Success & Fail
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s:contains("Gets") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Create Success & Fail
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s:contains("Create") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Update Success & Fail
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s:contains("Update") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Delete Success & Fail
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s=DeleteSuccess or Name_s=DeleteFail | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: CompareAndDelete Success & Fail
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s:contains("CompareAndDelete") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: CompareAndSwap Success & Fail
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=etcd Name_s:contains("CompareAndSwap") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Number of Container Backing Store Files
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=garden-linux Name_s=BackingStores | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Number of Directories in the Garden Depot
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=garden-linux Name_s=LoopDevices | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Number of Attached Loop Devices
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=garden-linux Name_s=DepotDirs | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,IP_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: LRPs
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s:contains("LRPs") and not Name_s:contains("Crash") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Tasks
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s:contains("Tasks") and not Name_s:contains("Convergence") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Crashing LRPs
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=bbs Name_s:contains("Crash") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Desired LRP Sync Duration
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=nsync_bulker Name_s=DesiredLRPSyncDuration | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Sent & Received Dropsonde Envelopes
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=MetronAgent Name_s:contains("Envelopes") | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Messages Unmarshalled
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=MetronAgent (Name_s:contains("dropsondeUnmarshaller") and Name_s:contains("Received")) or Name_s="dropsondeUnmarshaller.logMessageTotal" | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Dropsonde Messages Received by Agent Listener
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=MetronAgent Name_s="dropsondeAgentListener.receivedMessageCount" | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Dropsonde Bytes Received by Agent Listener
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=MetronAgent Name_s="dropsondeAgentListener.receivedByteCount" | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Messages Sent to Doppler
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=MetronAgent Name_s:contains("sentMessageCount") | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Bytes Sent to Doppler
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=MetronAgent Name_s:contains("sentByteCount") | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Errors Sent to Doppler
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=MetronAgent Name_s:contains("sendErrorCount") | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Number of Routes
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=route_emitter Name_s=RoutesTotal | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Total Routes Registered, Synced and Unregistered
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=route_emitter (Name_s=RoutesRegistered or Name_s=RoutesSynced or Name_s=RoutesUnregistered) | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Total Registration Messages Emitted
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=route_emitter Name_s=MessagesEmitted | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s

templates.name: Route Emitter Time to Sync
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=route_emitter Name_s=RouteEmitterSyncDuration | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Requests per Minute
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=gorouter Name_s=rejected_requests or Name_s=total_requests | measure sum(Delta_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 1Minute

templates.name: Responses per Minute
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=gorouter Name_s:contains("responses") | measure sum(Delta_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 1Minute

templates.name: Total Requests
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=gorouter Name_s=rejected_requests or Name_s=total_requests | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Total Responses
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=gorouter Name_s:contains("responses") | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Latency
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=gorouter Name_s:contains("latency") | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Route Lookup Time
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=gorouter Name_s=route_lookup_time | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Register Messages Received per Minute
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=gorouter Name_s:contains("registry_message") | measure sum(Delta_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s interval 1Minute

templates.name: Total Register Messages Received
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Origin_s=gorouter Name_s:contains("registry_message") | measure max(Total_d) by Environment_s,Job_s,Name_s

templates.name: Total Routes Registered
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=gorouter Name_s=total_routes | measure avg(Value_d) by Environment_s,Job_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: User & Non-user Not Found
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=uaa Name_s:contains("not_found_count") | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Failed Non-user Authentication Attempts
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=uaa Name_s="audit_service.principal_authentication_failure_count" | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Successful & Failed User Authentications
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=uaa Name_s:contains("user_authentication") | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Successful & Failed Client Authentications
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=uaa Name_s:contains("client_authentication") | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Successful & Failed Password Changes
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Origin_s=uaa Name_s:contains("user_password") | measure max(Value_d) by Environment_s,Name_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Receiving Rate by Nozzle Instance Every 5 Minutes
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Job_s=nozzle Name_s=eventsReceived | measure sum(Delta_d) by NozzleInstance_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Sending Rate by Nozzle Instance Every 5 Minutes
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Job_s=nozzle Name_s=eventsSent | measure sum(Delta_d) by NozzleInstance_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Lost Messages by Nozzle Instance
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Job_s=nozzle Name_s=eventsLost | measure max(Total_d) by NozzleInstance_s interval 5Minutes

templates.name: Total Recieved, Sent & Lost Messages by Nozzle Instance
templates.query: Type=CF_CounterEvent_CL Job_s=nozzle | measure max(Total_d) by NozzleInstance_s,Name_s

templates.name: Slow Consumer Alert
templates.query: Type=CF_ValueMetric_CL Name_s=slowConsumerAlert | measure max(Value_d) by NozzleInstance_s interval 5Minutes
